## TextTechnique interface

Runtime representation of \[\[TextStyle\]\] as parsed by \[\[StyleSetEvaluator\]\]. For technique parameters see \[\[TextTechniqueParams\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TextTechnique extends MakeTechniqueAttrs<TextTechniqueParams> 
```
